code_message: Entity not listed as required or optional for files with this suffix
The EEGChannelCount metadata does not match the number of channels with type EEG in the associated channels.tsv file.

Task, acquisition or run entities detected in coordsystem.tsv. Coordinate systems should generally not vary within a session. Consider removing the excess entity/entities or create new sessions when multiple coordinate systems are appropriate.

Task, acquisition or run entities detected in electrodes.tsv. Electrode definitions should generally not vary within a session. Consider removing the excess entity/entities or create a new session each time electrodes are reconfigured.
